content: the easy and fast cozy crochet hat is worked from the bottom-up using the mini-bean stitch just a little bit of seaming and you ve got a cozy functional and stylish addition to your winter wardrobe visit www knottednest com for the free version of this pattern pattern download - please note this listing is for the pattern only - pattern is written in us terms - pattern includes written instructions and step-by-step pictures - this pattern will be delivered via email in the form of a digital file pdf upon purchase skill level easy - level 2 -this pattern requires some decreasing and sewing sizing one size adult - medium but a chart is included to adjust size as written finished hat measures about 9 tall share your work follow along on instagram at @theknottednest tag @theknottednest and use the #cozybeancrochethat hashtag to show off your new project copyright the cozy bean crochet hat pattern and photographs are property of the knotted nest and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not alter share or sell this pattern in any way however you are welcome to sell the finished product that you make using this pattern please credit the knotted nest by including a link to the pattern listing if selling the finished piece online
